BERT¶

class models.bert_for_sentiment_classification.BertForSentimentClassification(max_seq_length=32)[source]¶

BERT fine-tuned on the Yelp Sentiment dataset for sentiment classification.

Parameters

max_seq_length (int, optional) – Maximum length of a sequence after tokenizing. Defaults to 32.

convert_text_to_ids(input_text)[source]¶

Takes a string input, tokenizes, formats, and returns a tensor with text IDs.

Parameters

input_text (str) – The text to tokenize

Returns

The ID of the tokenized text
